title: BAN THE FEEDERS
body: so tonight i've lost 41 LP with a 0/7/2 top laner and 1/7/1 top laner. If we could start baning these feeders and not all the people bitching at the feeders there would be less people being toxic because there are less people int feeding every other game and costing us 2 games worth of LP per game.

replies.body: Not everyone feeds every game, and im sure you've fed in a few of your games... so why aren't you banned?

now a 1/13/3 blitz support. Yeah its pretty much every game i have to try and hard carry. and yes i've wrote riot and they have said the same thing and when i send in a screen shot of the games in a row they say its just bad like nothing else.

jumped into a ranked game today, 1/7 MF adc and an unranked urgot. This stupid shit has taken me from S1 promos to Gold down to S5 0 LP.  This is why i feel a -10 KDA needs a rank ban for 5+ games so people have time to learn and trolls ghet kicked out of ranked for short periods of time.
if/when i feed ban me from rank for a few games i'm ok with that. i never said perma ban

jumped into a ranked game today, 1/7 MF adc and an unranked urgot. This stupid shit has taken me from S1 promos to Gold down to S5 0 LP.  This is why i feel a -10 KDA needs a rank ban for 5+ games so people have time to learn and trolls ghet kicked out of ranked for short periods of time.

If you find it funny to waste nights of LoL to people feeding/afking, or just taking new champs to them into rank than yeah it funny, but we have a mastery system with no purpose, people playing champs for the first time in rank, because tilting HARD and feeding out of anger then queing into another rank match fully tilted and RAGED.
Because if I look up your match history I'm sure I can find a game where you play like shit and feed too.

I'm sure you can but few. Even when my kda is bad i keep my cs up so i at least have items to do something. and if I go 0/7 as a top, mid or adc, ban me from rank for 5 games. Get un-tilted before I return to rank. Doesn't seem unfair to me. Push it more to a -10 KDA before it kicks in.
There is a huge difference in intentionally feeding and having a bad game...

0/7/1 isn't a bad game. there a point were you use your brain and stop trying to fight and farm under turrets and ward up. when you have 7 deaths and less than 90 cs in 25 minutes. that is beyond bad.
If you call that feeding, I can't imagine your reaction when you encounter a real feeding, Gonna go soundproof any of my glass items for future safety though.
i had 0/11/0 players this month as well just not normally 3 games in a row. and I'm talking a rank ban for x number of normal games
